0.user_question: Wendy was playing a video game and had 10 lives. In a hard part of the game she lost 6 lives. If she got 37 more lives in the next level, how many lives would she have?

ost_step.1: Identify the initial number of lives. The problem states Wendy had 10 lives.
ost_step.2: Subtract the number of lives she lost to find out how many lives she has left. She lost 6 lives, so she has 10 (initial number of lives) - 6 (lives lost) = 4 lives remaining.
ost_step.3: Add the number of lives she gained at the next level. She gained 37 lives, so she has 4 lives + 37 lives = 41 lives in total.
